script:
1). How about getting a bite to eat?
A hamburger and fries.
It's delicious, thank you.
No thanks. I just ate lunch. 
2). Where do I get more cups for the water cooler?
In the storage room. 
Thanks, I'd love a drink.
Yes, it is cool in here.
3). I don't know how to fix this copier.
I need to make 20 copies.
You've improved so much.
Neither do I. I'll go ask Bob.
